title.rendered: “Critical Injuries Reported in Recent Gaza Strip Battles: Updates on Soldiers from IDF Battalions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Two soldiers from the 94th Battalion, Kfir Brigade, were seriously injured today (Thursday) in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.

A soldier from the 931st Battalion, Nahal Brigade, was seriously injured yesterday (Wednesday) in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip.

A reservist from the 7421st Battalion, ‘Kiryati’ (4) Brigade, was seriously injured yesterday (Wednesday) in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.

A reservist from the 6261st Battalion, 261 Brigade, was seriously injured yesterday (Wednesday) in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.

The injured were evacuated to receive medical treatment at the hospital and their families were updated.
